# The `PtrToIntInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class represents a cast from a pointer to an integer. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::PtrToIntInst</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class represents a cast from a pointer to an integer.
